title: Skyprus-sama
body: Sky, how are you and your bf going with DJ Sona, I haven't been on for three weeks so I don't know. What are your thoughts?

replies.body:
Haven't actually bought it yet! 
Due to being on a scholarship atm, my first paycheck of the week came through yesterday!
Is it still discounted? I'm hoping to put some more RP on either tonight or tomorrow :D
It is not discounted. I missed out on that too.

Oh well!
I'll still be getting it anyway now I have moniies!

mon-aye-aye
That was me and my partner on Wednesday when we checked our accounts :D.
